Thomas Alan McCracken

Thomas Alan McCracken

About Me

I like to create. That's why I joined the Iron Yard, a boot camp style school, in September 2014 to become a Front-End Developer. I enjoy being at the intersection of design and engineering to create great user experience. To me, user experience is the highest priority in development.


If you're looking for someone who gets excited about things like CSS Parallax, jQuery, data visualization, or anything web-related then give me a shout. I'd love to hear from you.

Resume

  • Studied Front-End Engineering at The Iron Yard Academy
  • Geographic Systems Analyst for Six Years
  • Graduate degree from Georgia Tech in 2008
  • Undergraduate degree from University of Georgia in 2005
